feature.name: feature
feature.title: Powerful Features for Every Creator
feature.description: Whether you're a hobbyist, professional designer, or crafter, our photo to line drawing tool provides everything you need.

items.title: No Drawing Skills Required
items.description: Transform any photo into professional line art without any artistic background. Perfect for beginners and experts alike.

items.title: Lightning Fast Processing
items.description: Get your line drawing results in seconds, not hours. Our optimized AI ensures quick turnaround times for all your projects.

items.title: Customizable Settings
items.description: Adjust line thickness, detail level, and contrast to get the perfect line art style for your specific project needs.

items.title: Multiple Output Formats
items.description: Download your line drawings as PNG, SVG, or PDF. Compatible with embroidery software, laser cutters, and design programs.

items.title: Privacy Protected
items.description: Your photos are processed securely and never stored on our servers. Complete privacy and data protection guaranteed.

items.title: Works Everywhere
items.description: Use our photo to line drawing converter on any device - desktop, tablet, or mobile. No software installation required.

usage.name: usage
usage.title: How Photo to Line Drawing Works
usage.description: Our advanced AI technology converts your photos into clean line art in just 3 simple steps.

items.title: Upload Your Photo
items.description: Simply drag and drop your image or select from your device. We support all common photo formats including JPG, PNG, WebP and HEIC.

items.title: Choose Line Drawing Style
items.description: Our intelligent algorithm analyzes your photo to identify key contours, edges, and important details, creating a clean line drawing conversion.

items.title: Download Your Artwork
items.description: Get your high-quality line art in multiple formats. Perfect for printing, digital projects, or importing into design software.

faq.name: faq
faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions About Photo to Line Drawing Conversion
faq.description: Everything you need to know about converting photos to line drawings

items.title: What types of photos work best for line drawing conversion?
items.description: Photos with clear subjects and good contrast work best. Portraits, pets, buildings, and objects with defined edges produce excellent line art results. Our AI can handle various lighting conditions and automatically adjusts for optimal line drawing output.

items.title: Can I use the line drawings for commercial projects?
items.description: Yes! All line drawings created with our photo to line drawing tool can be used for both personal and commercial purposes. You retain full rights to your converted images and can use them for products, marketing, or any business application.

items.title: What file formats are supported for upload and download?
items.description: Upload: JPG, PNG, HEIC, WebP, and most common image formats. Download: High-quality PNG for raster graphics, SVG for scalable vector line art, and PDF for printing. Choose the format that best suits your intended use case.

items.title: How long does photo to line drawing conversion take?
items.description: Processing time depends on your account type: Free users can expect conversions to complete within 50-60 seconds, while premium subscribers enjoy priority processing with results in just 20-30 seconds. Image size and complexity may slightly affect processing time, but our optimized AI servers ensure consistent quality regardless of speed.

items.title: Is my photo data secure and private?
items.description: Absolutely. Your photos are processed securely and automatically deleted from our servers after conversion. We never store, share, or use your images for any purpose other than creating your line drawing. Your privacy is our top priority.

items.title: Can I adjust the line thickness and detail level?
items.description: No, you cannot adjust the line thickness and detail level.
